products.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

products.title: Burst Champagn Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: A gorgeous off-white tone with just the ever so slightest pink tinge, like a bottle of pink champagne, you will find that this blind is the perfect way to balance darkly coloured environments and give a strong contrast that doesn't overwhelm. Illuminated from behind you will get a warm white glow with the softest rose tint that floods the room with a slightly romantic vibe.
